definition: the train of thought in writing
Joris Ivens (1898-1989), Dutch documentary filmmaker and committed communist
pinyin: You2 li3 si1 · Yi1 wen2 si1

sentences.english: And it's that strong support layer that evens out the top layer and wards off wrinkles.
sentences.chinese: 它的这一强有力的支持层，文思了顶层和病房了皱纹。

sentences.english: Mrs. Evans or yourself will have to pick them up at the airport.
sentences.chinese: 伊文思太太或者你本人都得去机场接他们。

sentences.english: The Evans blue EB was used to test the permeability of blood brain barrier BBB.
sentences.chinese: 用伊文思蓝测定血脑屏障的通透性。

sentences.english: Join the Squad and rescue the hapless Darwins from fire ravaged buildings.
sentences.chinese: 加入国家队和救援不幸文思从消防蹂躏建筑物。

sentences.english: 'I don't understand this whole concept of writer's block,' says Mr. Ondaatje, who says he is working on a novel at the moment but declines to elaborate.
sentences.chinese: 他说，“我不大理解文思堵塞这个概念。

sentences.english: How many salesmen call on Mr. Evans every day?
sentences.chinese: 每天有几多推销员造访伊文思师长教师呢？

sentences.english: 'I don't understand this whole concept of writer's block, ' says Mr. Ondaatje, who says he is working on a novel at the moment but declines to elaborate.
sentences.chinese: 他说，“我不大理解文思堵塞这个概念。

sentences.english: Evans' real concern is about privacy.
sentences.chinese: 伊文思真正关心的是人们的隐私。

sentences.english: Mr. Blevins says he has many reasons to be happy.
sentences.chinese: 布莱文思先生说他有很多理由高兴。

sentences.english: The great wealth of Clavius's family easily attracted the highest caliber of warriors.
sentences.chinese: 克莱文思家的巨额财富能轻易吸引到最有才干的战士。

definition: literary talent/literary grace/rich and bright colors
correct (literary)/upright/(hon.) Please point out my shortcomings./I await your esteemed corrections.
vigor of strokes in calligraphy or drawing/vigor of style in literary composition
